ServiceRoot.title: ServiceRoot.0.94.0

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.specification: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

Time.description: The current time as reported by the owner of this SPMA Service
Time.specification: The value of this string shall represent the time of the SPMA service.

ServiceVersion.description: The version of the SPMA service
ServiceVersion.specification: The value of this string shall represent the version of the SPMA service.  The format of this string shall be of the format majorversion.minorversion.errata in compliance with Protocol Version section of the SPMA specification.

UUID.description: Unique identifier for a service instance.  This value should be an exact match of the UUID value returned in a 200OK from an SSDP M-SEARCH request during discovery.
UUID.specification: The value of this string shall represent the id of the SPMA service instance.  The format of this string shall be a 32-byte value in the form 8-4-4-4-12.  This value shall be an exact match of the UUID value returned in a 200OK from an SSDP M-SEARCH request during discovery.

Systems.description: This is a link to a collection of Systems.
Systems.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Systems schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Systems'.

Chassis.description: This is a link to a collection of Chassis.
Chassis.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Chassis schema. The last segment of the path shall be 'Chassis'.

Managers.description: This is a link to a collection of Managers.
Managers.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Managers schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Managers'.

Tasks.description: This is a link to the Task Service.
Tasks.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the TaskService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Tasks'

Sessions.description: This is a link to the Collection of Sessions.
Sessions.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the Session schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Sessions'.

AccountService.description: This is a link to the Account Service.
AccountService.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the AccountService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'AccountService'

EventService.description: This is a link to the EventService.
EventService.specification: The classes structure shall only contain a reference to a resource that complies to the EventService schema.  The last segment of the path shall be 'EventService'.

Registries.description: This is a link to a collection of Registries.
Registries.specification: This object shall only contain a reference to a collection of resources that comply to the SchemaFile schema where the files are Registries.  The last segment of the path shall be 'Registries'.

Links.description: The links object contains the links to other resources that are related to this resource.

ServiceRoot.description: This object represents the root SPMA service.
ServiceRoot.specification: This object represents the root SPMA service.  All values for resources described by this schema shall comply to the requirements as described in the SPMA specification.
